issuer_name: Dream Office Real Estate Investment Trust

data_quality.validation_notes: Complete financial data extracted from condensed consolidated financial statements. 40% distribution cut occurred in Q2 2023. Substantial issuer bid completed June 2023 for 12.5M units at $15.50/unit ($193.8M).

dilution_detail.reconciliation_note: Diluted units include basic units (32,623k REIT A Units + 5,234k LP B Units = 37,857k) plus unvested DTUs and associated income DTUs (12,025k) = 49,882k diluted weighted average units for Q2 2023.
dilution_detail.disclosure_source: MD&A page 34, Weighted average number of units section

ffo_affo.notes: AFFO and ACFO not disclosed by Dream Office REIT. FFO is primary metric. Distribution cut from historical levels - Q2 2023 distribution = $0.25/unit. Weighted average units declined due to substantial issuer bid (SIB) completed June 22, 2023 for 12.5M units.

portfolio.notes: 26 active properties + 2 properties under development. In-place occupancy 80.9%, including commitments 83.9%. GLA = 5.1 million SF. Toronto downtown: 3.2M SF (88.1% occupancy). Other markets: 1.9M SF (76.8% occupancy). Properties under development: 366 Bay Street and 67 Richmond Street West (modernization/decarbonization projects).

other_adjustments.label: other_1
other_adjustments.description: Net loss (income) from investment in Dream Industrial REIT
other_adjustments.source_page: Page 42, Condensed Consolidated Statements of Comprehensive Income

other_adjustments.label: other_2
other_adjustments.description: Share of FFO from investment in Dream Industrial REIT

other_adjustments.label: other_3
other_adjustments.description: Interest expense on subsidiary redeemable units

other_adjustments.label: other_4
other_adjustments.description: Principal repayments on finance lease liabilities

ffo_affo_components.notes: FFO calculation: Net loss $(48,328) + Adjustments $84,692 = FFO $36,364. Dream Office REIT uses unique adjustments related to equity-accounted investment in Dream Industrial REIT. Fair value adjustments to investment properties ($50,934) and financial instruments ($(17,542)) are material. Depreciation and amortization includes property and equipment ($85k) plus intangible assets amortization from depreciation line ($5,658k).

missing_adjustments_acfo: Most ACFO adjustments not disclosed separately. Dream Office REIT does not report ACFO as a non-GAAP measure.
acfo_components.notes: Cash flow from operations: $34,065 (six months ended June 30, 2023). Dream Office REIT does not calculate or report ACFO. Investment in lease incentives and initial direct leasing costs ($21,343) and building improvements ($12,576) extracted from cash flow statement. Distributions from Dream Industrial REIT investment: $8,483 (included in CFO in cash flow statement but management views as part of operating distributions).

cash_flow_investing.notes: Total CFI: $304,162 (six months ended June 30, 2023). Major items: Property dispositions $134,704, Sale of Dream Industrial REIT units $178,405 (net proceeds), Distributions from DIR $8,483. Outflows: Building improvements $(12,576), Development properties $(3,758), Advances on loan facility $(1,096).

cash_flow_financing.notes: Total CFF: $(333,901) (six months ended June 30, 2023). Debt principal repayments: Scheduled $(8,678) + Lump sum $(232,726) = $(241,404). New borrowings: $177,542. Distributions on REIT A Units: $(22,759). Major transaction: Substantial issuer bid $(194,214) + NCIB cancellations $(22,231) = $(216,445) total unit buybacks. Interest paid on debt: $(27,775). Interest paid on subsidiary redeemable units: $(2,617).

liquidity.data_source: Balance sheet as at June 30, 2023. Cash on hand (excludes cash held in co-owned properties and JVs that cannot be used at Trust's sole discretion) = $10,611. Credit facilities drawn: $289,560. Undrawn capacity not disclosed separately but available liquidity referenced in MD&A.
liquidity.notes: Available liquidity referenced in MD&A as non-GAAP measure. Credit facility appears fully drawn at $289,560 as at June 30, 2023. Cash runway considerations: Trust completed substantial issuer bid ($193.8M) and property dispositions ($134.7M) during H1 2023 to improve liquidity and reduce leverage. Distribution cut implemented (40% reduction to $0.25/unit/quarter from historical $0.42/unit/quarter).

validation.notes: Balance sheet balances: Total assets $2,701,495 = Total liabilities $1,455,084 + Total equity $1,246,411. NOI margin: $51,468 / $95,228 = 54.1% (reasonable for office REIT). Occupancy: 80.9% in-place, 83.9% with commitments (moderate for office sector post-COVID). Leverage: Net debt $1,298,627 / Net assets $2,690,884 = 48.3% (elevated). Interest coverage: Trailing 12-month adjusted EBITDAFV $125,287 / Interest $56,759 = 2.21x (adequate but tight).
